price: څوك چې په آسمانونو او ځمكه كې دي، ټول هغه ته سوالونه كوي. هغه هره ورځ (تل) په يو څه كار كې دى.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
